title: Jonathan Pageau/Adam Friended Interview Pt. 2-  Value vs Object Based Reality (MOQ Basics til 14:00)
description:
More commentary on the Pageau-Friended Dialog, understanding from a MOQ perspective  and to help bridge the gap hopefully. If you want to skip the MOQ preamble, which I thought was needed for non Pirsig viewers, start at 14:00


Hoffman Ted talk: https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/#inbox/QgrcJHsBqLdZxNDVwLLZhqTlcvxfFSfPgng?projector=1
